The band's second album, Les Tremblements sÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢immobilisent, won three FÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©lix Awards in 2006. In 2007, they were featured, along with The Stills, The Besnard Lakes and Mahjor Bidet, on the bill of Quebec Scene, a concert in Ottawa sponsored by CBC Radio 3.
